text: ESC Clermont Business School is an European higher studies establishment. The school is in Clermont-Ferrand. It has been created in 1919.GROUPE ESC CLERMONT : 100 ANS ET PAS UNE RIDE ! ESC Clermont is specialist in the fields of economics, social sciences and management. ==References== == Further reading == * ESC Clermont website Category:1919 establishments in France Category:Education in France Category:Clermont-Ferrand
title: ESC Clermont Business School
